alert.note: Alert for Dickson; Giles; Hickman; Humphreys; Lawrence; Lewis; Marshall; Maury; Williamson (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 06 at 12:42PM CDT by NWS Nashville
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Lewis, Dickson, central Marshall, northeastern Lawrence, Maury, western Williamson, northwestern Giles, southeastern Humphreys and Hickman Counties through 130 PM CDT... At 1242 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Hurricane Mills to Summertown. Movement was northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Columbia, Dickson, Lewisburg, Centerville, Spring Hill, Mount Pleasant, White Bluff, Thompson`s Station, McEwen, Burns, Hurricane Mills, Fairview, Summertown, Charlotte, Vanleer, Lynnville, Gordonsburg, Bon Aqua, Culleoka and Primm Springs. This includes the following highways... Interstate 40 between mile markers 147 and 184. Interstate 65 between mile markers 29 and 53. Interstate 840 between mile markers 1 and 26. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Dickson; Giles; Hickman; Humphreys; Lawrence; Lewis; Marshall; Maury; Williamson
